name: "You see it" corset vest
description: The "YOU SEE IT" Long Corset vest is a superior body sculptor that accelerates weight loss through high compression, perspiration and micro massage. This body sculptor helps you to get the figure you have always wanted by instantly lifting, shaping and slimming the body and flattening your stomach and waist. To reduce waist measurements, it is recommended to wear the vest between 8 to 10 hours daily. The "YOU SEE IT" Vest is the only clinically proven body sculptor that helps reduce waist measurement by 1 to 4 inches within 30 days. It also give the appearance of fuller lifted breast.

name: The Roxy
description:
Are you ready to maximize your workout? Wear workout Corset anytime your going to be active. Take it to the gym or for a run outside . put the girdle around your mid section it will create compression in your core. This stimulates thermal activity and excess perspiration. The process allows toxins and impurities to exit the skin, while mobilizing fat cells. 

This corset is constructed from a latex core with a soft cotton exterior and interior lining. It sits at your waist, extending to the upper abdiminals. Two columns of hook-and-eye closures allow you to size the garment down with you. The bones inside anchor the girdle and prevent it from moving while wearing it.

RESULTS 
-Midsection control 
-Increased thermal activity 
-Loss of inches 
-Mobilizes fat cells 
-Stimulates perspiration

FEATURES 
-Latex workout band 
-Hook-and-eye closures 
-Flexible boning 
-Cotton lining
